Cards.name: Midnight Snack
Cards.text: Prophecy, Guard. Last Gasp: Reduce the cost of a random Dragon in your hand by 1.

Cards.name: Mudcrab Anklesnapper
Cards.text: Summon: Deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Cards.name: Priest of the Eight
Cards.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (willpower) creatures.

Cards.name: Raging Horker
Cards.text: When Raging Horker takes damage, it gains +1/+1.

Cards.name: Shield Breaker
Cards.text: +2/+2. Summon: An enemy creature loses Guard.

Cards.name: Sorcerer's Negation
Cards.text: Silence a creature, then deal 2 damage to it.

Cards.name: Soul Tear
Cards.text:
Level 1: Draw a creature from your discard pile. 
Level 2: Draw a creature from your discard pile and give it +2/+2. 
Level 3: Draw a creature from your discard pile and give it +5/+5.

Cards.name: Steelheart Vanquisher
Cards.text: Slay: Give friendly Orcs +1/+1.

Cards.name: Stormcloak Skirmisher
Cards.text: Breakthrough

Cards.name: Stormcloak Vanguard
Cards.text: Charge. Last Gasp: Put a 5/5 Stormcloak Battalion in your hand.

Cards.name: Arcane Enchanter
Cards.text: When you draw an item, give it a random Keyword.

Cards.name: Assassin's Ritual
Cards.text: Give a creature Lethal and Ward.

Cards.name: Berserker of the Pale
Cards.text: When you summon another creature with 5 power or more, give it +1/+1 and Breakthrough.

Cards.name: Blades Lookout
Cards.text: When you summon a Dragon, draw a card.

Cards.name: Call of Valor
Cards.text:
Level 1: Summon a 3/3 Sovngarde Hero.
Level 2: Summon two 3/3 Sovngarde Heroes.
Level 3: Fill a lane with 3/3 Sovngarde Heroes.

Cards.name: Cliffside Lookout
Cards.text: When you summon a Dragon, Cliffside Lookout gains +1/+1.

Cards.name: Companion Harbinger
Cards.text: Beast Form: Give friendly Werwolves +1/+1.

Cards.name: Crusader's Assault
Cards.text: Give a creature +2/+0, Breakthrough and “Slay and Pilfer: Draw a card” this turn.

Cards.name: Dark Rebirth
Cards.text: Sacrifice a creature to summon a copy of it.

Cards.name: East Empire Crafter
Cards.text: When you summon another creature with 5 health or more, give it +1/+1 and Guard.

Cards.name: Eldergleam Matron
Cards.text: Summon: Put a random Animal into your hand.

Cards.name: Fire Breath
Cards.text:
Level 1: Deal 2 damage to a creature.
Level 2: Deal 4 damage to a creature.
Level 3: Deal 10 damage to a creature.

Cards.name: Ghost Sea Lookout
Cards.text: When you summon a Dragon, Ghost Sea Lookout gains a Ward.

Cards.name: Grandmaster Delphine
Cards.text: Can't be damaged or targeted by enemy Dragons.

Cards.name: Grim Shield-Brother
Cards.text: Beast Form: +1/+1 and Drain.

Cards.name: Grisly Gourmet
Cards.text: Summon: Transform an enemy creature with 2 power or less into a Sweet Roll.

Cards.name: Innkeeper Delphine
Cards.text: After you play a Dragon or Shout, Innkeeper Delphine changes into Grandmaster Delphine.

Cards.name: Mage's Trick
Cards.text: Deal 1 damage, gain 1 health, and draw a card.

Cards.name: Master Swordsmith
Cards.text: At the start of your turn, give each item in your deck +1/+1.

Cards.name: Mentor of the Watch
Cards.text: Prophecy, Guard. Summon: Give a creature in your hand Guard.

Cards.name: Revealing the Unseen
Cards.text: Put two random actions into your hand.

Cards.name: Shadowmaster
Cards.text: Summon: Give a friendly creature Cover. Your opponent can't target it with actions until your next turn.

Cards.name: Shadowscale Partisan
Cards.text: Lethal. Summon: +0/+2 if you have another creature with Lethal.

Cards.name: Skyforge
Cards.text: Activate: Equip a friendly creature with a Steel Dagger. If Skyforge has equipped 3 daggers, it changes into Underforge.

Cards.name: Spellsword's Summoning
Cards.text: Summon a random 1-cost creature in each lane.

Cards.name: Stormcloak Camp
Cards.text: Oigoing. At the end of your turn, if a creature died this turn, deal 2 damage to your opponent.

Cards.name: Stronghold Patrol
Cards.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (strength) creatures.

Cards.name: Thalmor Embassy
Cards.text: Ongoing. Your High Elves cost 1 less. You can't be damaged by actions.

Cards.name: Thalmor Justiciar
Cards.text: After you play an action, summon a 1/1 Thalmor Soldier.

Cards.name: Thieves Guild Fence
Cards.text: When you draw a card on your turn, reduce its cost by 1.

Cards.name: Thieves Guild Shadowfoot
Cards.text: Summon: Steal the top card of the opponent's deck and replace it with a Counterfeit Trinket.

Cards.name: Uncaged Wolf
Cards.text: Summon: +1/+1 for each other friendly Wolf.

Cards.name: Unrelenting Force
Cards.text:
Level 1:
Unsummon an enemy creature with power 3 or less.

Level 2:
Unsummon an enemy creature.

Level 3:
Unsummon all enemy creatures in a lane.

Cards.name: Warrior's Fury
Cards.text: Give a random creature and item in your hand +2/+2.

Cards.name: Woodland Lookout
Cards.text: When you summon a Dragon, gain 4 health.

Cards.name: Young Dragonborn
Cards.text: When Young Dragonborn Slays a Dragon, put a random Shout into your hand. After you play a Shout, Young Dragonborn gains +1/+1.

Cards.name: Aela's Huntmate
Cards.text: Beast Form: +1/+1 and draw a card.

Cards.name: Battlemage's Onslaught
Cards.text: Put a random action, item, and creature into your hand.

Cards.name: Candlehearth Brawler
Cards.text: Charge, Guard

Cards.name: Corrupted Shade
Cards.text: Ward. At the end of your turn, if Corrupted Shade doesn't have a Ward, sacrifice it.

Cards.name: Devour
Cards.text: Destroy a creature with 4 power or less and give its Keywords to a random Dragon in your hand.

Cards.name: Dragon's Fury
Cards.text: Deal 3 damage to a creature, and 3 extra damage for each friendly Dragon.

Cards.name: Dragonplate Armor
Cards.text: +2/+2. Summon: +2/+2 if you have a Dragon in your discard pile.

Cards.name: Dwarven Dynamo
Cards.text: Summon: Give another (Neutral) creature +3/+3 and Guard.

Cards.name: Emperor Titus Mede II
Cards.text: At the end of your turn, give the top creature of your deck +1/+1 and Guard.

Cards.name: Experimental Scroll
Cards.text:
Experimental Scroll is either Enlightenment, Flame Blast, or Flame Cloak. Don't worry which one it is. Just give it a try.
Elnightenment: Give each friendly creature two random Keywords.
Flame Blast: Deal 2 damage to each enemy creature.
Flame Cloak: Deal 5 damage to each player.

Cards.name: Frost Troll
Cards.text: Regenerate. When Frost Troll takes damage, it gains that much power.

Cards.name: Glass Helm of Remedy
Cards.text: +0/+4. Summon: You gain 4 health.

Cards.name: Greybeard Mentor
Cards.text: Summon: Draw a random Shout from your deck.

Cards.name: High Hrothgar
Cards.text: Ongoing. When you summon a creature, its power becomes equal to its health.

Cards.name: Hit and Run
Cards.text: Draw five cards. Discard your hand at the end of the turn.

Cards.name: Imperial Camp
Cards.text: Ongoing. Summon: Put a 1/2 Septim Guardsman with Guard into your hand. Friendly Guards have +1/+0.

Cards.name: Inspiring Stormcloak
Cards.text: Last Gasp: Summon a 2/2 Rallying Stormcloak in each lane.

Cards.name: J'Zargo
Cards.text: Summon: Put an Experimental Scroll into your hand.

Cards.name: Lay Down Arms
Cards.text: Set a creature's power and health to 1.

Cards.name: Legate Rikke
Cards.text: When you summon an Imperial, summon a 1/1 Imperial Grunt in the other lane.

Cards.name: MIstveil Enchanter
Cards.text: Ward. Summon: +2/+0 if you have another creature with Ward.

Cards.name: Monk's Strike
Cards.text: Move a friendly creature and give it +3/+0 and Drain this turn.

Cards.name: Mystic Dragon
Cards.text: Prophecy

Cards.name: Restoration Tutor
Cards.text: Summon: Heal a creature.

Cards.name: Revered Guardian
Cards.text: Guard

Cards.text: Summon: Reveal three random cards in your opponent’s deck. Choose one and draw a copy of it.

Cards.name: Serpentine Stalker
Cards.text: Slay: +2/+0. May move to attack creatures in the other lane.

Cards.name: Sightless Skulk
Cards.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (agility) creatures.

Cards.name: Stormcloak Avenger
Cards.text: At the end of your turn, if three or more friendly creatures died this turn, summon a 2/2 Rallying Stormcloak.

Cards.name: Swims-at-Night
Cards.text: Summon: Put a random 0-cost card into your hand. After you play a 0-cost card, Swims-at-Night gains +1/+1.

Cards.name: Ulfric's Zealot
Cards.text: Last Gasp: Put a Heavy Battleaxe into your hand.

Cards.name: Barbas
Cards.text: Summon: Choose one: -Stay: Gains +1/+1 and Guard. Fetch: Put a random Daedra into your hand. Roll Over: Gains Charge.

Cards.name: Battlefield Scrounger
Cards.text: Charge. Slay: Put a random item into your hand.

Cards.name: Brynjolf
Cards.text: Drain, When a friendly creature Pilfers or Drain, gain +1 magicka this turn.

Cards.name: Cauldron Keeper
Cards.text: Guard. Summon: Give your Activated supports an extra use. You may Activate your supports an extra time each turn.

Cards.name: College of Winterhold
Cards.text: Uses: 3. Activate: Reveal three random 1-cost actions and draw one. Then, increase the cost of cards this reveals by 1.

Cards.name: Court Wizard
Cards.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other  creatures.

Cards.name: Insightful Scholar
Cards.text: Prophecy. Summon: Draw a card for each card your opponent drew this turn.

Cards.name: Karthspire Scourge
Cards.text: Summon: Give all enemy creatures in this lane -1/-0.

Cards.name: Lydia
Cards.text: Guard. Lydia guards both lanes.

Cards.name: Prized Chicken
Cards.text: Last Gasp: Fill this lane with 1/1 Angry Villagers.

Cards.name: Snowhawk detachment
Cards.text: Guard. Summon: +1/+1 if you have another creature with Guard.

Cards.name: Thief of Dreams
Cards.text: Summon: See a vision of two of your opponent's cards. Guess which one is in their hand. If you're right, draw a copy of it.

Cards.name: Ulfric Stormcloak
Cards.text: Breakthrough, When you play a Shout, draw a random Nord from your deck.

Cards.name: Whiterun Protector
Cards.text: Beast Form: +2/+2, Guard, and Regenerate.

Cards.name: Winterhold Illusionist
Cards.text: Summon: Another creature disappears, then returns at the end of the turn.

Cards.name: Bandit Ringleader
Cards.text: Summon: Other friendly creatures in this lane have "Pilfer: Draw a card" this turn.

Cards.name: Bringer of Nightmares
Cards.text: Summon: See a vision of a random creature, then you must choose a creature to transform into it.

Cards.name: Conjuration Scholar
Cards.text: Summon: Summon a 5/5 Frost Atronach with Guard.

Cards.name: Dragon Mound
Cards.text: Ongoing. Summon: Transform all cards in your deck into random Dragons. Your Dragons cost 1 less.

Cards.name: Dragon Priest Mask
Cards.text: +2/+2 Summon: Trigger the wielder's summon ability.

Cards.name: Echo of Akatosh
Cards.text: Summon: Give each creature in your deck a random Keyword.

Cards.name: Icewing Dragon
Cards.text: Summon: Shackle an enemy creature.

Cards.name: Nightprowler
Cards.text: When Nightprowler gains Cover, draw a card.

Cards.name: Praetorian Commander
Cards.text: Summon: Give creatures in your deck +2/+2.

Cards.name: Shearpoint Dragon
Cards.text: Summon: Give a creature -2/-2. When you reduce a creature's power or health with another effect, reduce it by an extra 1.
